TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkArea/LinkAreaConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供将 对象与其他各种表示形式相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基本类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 决不要创建的实例。You should never create an instance of a . 改为调用方法的。Instead, call the method of . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，类型不返回任何属性。By default, a type does not return any properties. 只需调用此方法的简单实现正确的数据类型。An easy implementation of this method can just call for the correct data type.
